member.name: E:Waher.Networking.XMPP.P2P.XmppServerlessMessaging.PeerAddressRemoved
member.summary: Event raised when address information about a peer has been removed.

member.name: E:Waher.Networking.XMPP.P2P.XmppServerlessMessaging.PeerAddressReceived
member.summary: Event raised when address information about a peer has been received.

member.name: E:Waher.Networking.XMPP.P2P.XmppServerlessMessaging.OnNewXmppClient
member.summary: Event raised when a new XMPP client has been created.

member.param: Bare JID of peer to connect to.
Method to call when connection is established.
State object to pass on to callback method.

member.name: E:Waher.Networking.XMPP.P2P.XmppServerlessMessaging.OnResynch
member.summary: Event raised when the peer-to-peer connection parameters need to be updated for a given remote JID.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.XMPP.P2P.XmppServerlessMessaging.CanConnectToPeer(System.String)
member.summary: If it is possible to connect directly to a given peer, given it's bare JID.
member.returns: If it is possible to connect directly to the peer.
